inclusion.criterion: Adult patients, age greater than or equal to 18
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Undergoing medically necessary diagnostic or therapeutic pericardiocentesis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cardiogenic shock (sustained systolic blood pressure less than or equal to 80 mm Hg
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or nursing
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unable to undergo magnetic resonance imaging
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN and presented with symptoms of cholecystitis. A pericardiocentesis was performed and the fluid analysis was consistent with Burkitt's lymphoma.
